title: julie f
text: I bought a roller blind, the size I needed was smaller the the average size you can buy in the shops, It was about Â£15 more then the 180cm that you can buy but we didn't have the hassle of cutting it to size and the choice of colours and fabrics are amazing, we got the perfect colour. I will definitely recommend and I will definitely use blinds2go again A****
